bio: Web Business Strategist, Media and Community Specialist, Trainer & Speaker University of Leicester University of Tuebingen University of Constance Managing Director of The Strategy Web. Instructor, trainer, moderator and speaker at various leading web events, seminars and webinars.  Lecturer at Bavarian Academy of Advertising (BAW). IDG Global Solutions Strategic Marketing & Sales Services Director CBS interactive GmbH Director Sales & Marketing silicon.de GmbH Partner/Director Sales & Marketing
